akas: Lo Shama'ata? Ani Sakamoto Israel (Hebrew title)
Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: Lo Shama'ata? Ani Sakamoto Israel (Hebrew title)
Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto World-wide (English title)

1.title: Class 1-2 Sakamoto/Bee Quiet

episode of.title: Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Sakamoto is the coolest. No, really, who else could not only survive multiple pranks unscathed, but also combat a bee with nothing but a protractor? Only Sakamoto, that's who.

2.title: I'd Rather Protect Than Be Protected/Psychological Techniques for Romance That You Can Use Today

episode of.title: Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Sakamoto inadvertently witnesses a bullying, which leads to him working at a fast food restaurant, and a girl in his class is hell-bent on making him obsessed with her.

3.title: Errand Boy Sakamoto/Love Hide-And-Seek

episode of.title: Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: As a new gopher, Sakamoto is TOO good at attending to the needs of the toughest bully in school. Later, Sakamoto escapes the affections of Yoshinobu's mother!

4.title: Is Sakamoto a Pervert?/Classroom Scene Omnibus/The Summer of Sakamoto's Disappearance

episode of.title: Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Sakamoto is always perfectly on time, draws like an angel, cooks like a master, creates his own parachute, and... disappears?

5.title: Softball Throwing/Charisma Yankee Senior 8823/Health Care

episode of.title: Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Sakamoto is challenged to a fight by the second year head of delinquents, Hayabusa. Has Sakamoto met his match? Later, Sakamoto gets a cold

6.title: Go Home Rules/Love Acrossing Camera/Cafeteria Marketing

episode of.title: Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Sakamoto's charisma continues to transcend all boundaries. His antics not only charm bullies but also school children and... pale female ghosts with long black hair?!

7.title: Is Sakamoto Really a Pervert?/The French Revolution of Sera

episode of.title: Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: For Acchan's gang, the curtain guarding the over 18 video section seems impassable, until Sakamoto appears. Later, Sera wants to take Sakamoto down a peg at the sports meet.

8.title: Cultural Festival Is Gloomy

episode of.title: Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Sakamoto's class is making a display for the school festival, but when an older delinquent returns to the school, even Sakamoto may not be able to escape his game.

9.title: The Meeting Between Sakamoto and Me/Nearest, Yet Far Person

episode of.title: Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: Girls from Sakamoto's class reminisce on how they met him, and Kubota comes down with a cold. but shows up to school anyway?

10.title: Demon Lord/Lacking Thing

episode of.title: Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: Sakamoto is invited to a mixer, a social situation he knows nothing about! Then, it's Hayabusa's turn to enter a foreign situation, but he's not alone.

11.title: No Need for Warmth/1-2 Memories

episode of.title: Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: Acchan is excited to teach Sakamoto about playing in the snow, but he comes to a realization that Fukase will use to his advantage.

12.title: So Long, Sakamoto-kun

episode of.title: Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto (TV Series 2016– )

12.plot: Sakamoto is giving the farewell speech at graduation when Acchan attacks him! Fukase seems to be set on never leaving school, but perhaps this scheme will be his last.

13.title: Haven't You Heard? I Was Sakamoto

episode of.title: Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto (TV Series 2016– )

13.plot: The students of Class 2-1 reminisce about their time with Sakamoto, contemplate what he might be up to at present time, and wonder where he might be headed.

imdb.plot outline: First year high school student Sakamoto isn't just cool, he's the coolest! Almost immediately after starting school, he began attracting everyone's attention. The girls love him, and most of the boys resent him. There's even a boy in the class who works as a model, but who is constantly upstaged by Sakamoto! No matter what tricks the other boys try to play on him, Sakamoto always manages to foil them with ease and grace. Though Sakamoto may seem cool and aloof, he helps others when asked, such as in the case of the boy in his class who was being constantly bullied. No matter what difficulties Sakamoto encounters, he moves through his high school life with confidence and class.
imdb.title: Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto
plot: Sakamoto is a genius who is well liked by both girls and boys. Despite the strange situations he may be in, Sakamoto always manages to fix the problem in absolute perfection while still being over the top.

First year high school student Sakamoto isn't just cool, he's the coolest! Almost immediately after starting school, he began attracting everyone's attention. The girls love him, and most of the boys resent him. There's even a boy in the class who works as a model, but who is constantly upstaged by Sakamoto! No matter what tricks the other boys try to play on him, Sakamoto always manages to foil them with ease and grace. Though Sakamoto may seem cool and aloof, he helps others when asked, such as in the case of the boy in his class who was being constantly bullied. No matter what difficulties Sakamoto encounters, he moves through his high school life with confidence and class.::Shakti Prasanna Mishra
